name: Snack Strife
description:
In a world where food has replaced most building supplies, two group fight it out to uncover which Food Group reigns supreme.

You play as a fighter pilot for the healthy food and you must battle the unhealthy food that will try and shoot you down.

Shoot down Candy Corn, Hotdog Destroyers and Sundae Boats as you try to survive. Change your Weapons, Engine and Body types to customize your gameplay.

Not every Game is exactly the same!
